name: The Great Escape (itch) (CandyDandyMan, Procyon B)
description:
Made for "My First Game Jam Summer 2021" in 14 days by 2 IRL friends. Constructive criticism is greatly appreciated! Post your highscore in the comments!

The Great Escape is an fast paced arcade style game about trying to free people from a dungeon before the time runs out. You can't save everyone though, so who will you choose?

Arrow Keys or WASD for movement. Touch the prisoners to free them and make them follow you. Bring them to the teleporter in order to save as many as you can! Press space to restart.
